newsitem.title: USA: McDonnell Douglas says EVA orders 2 MD-11s.
newsitem.headline: McDonnell Douglas says EVA orders 2 MD-11s.

text.p: McDonnell Douglas Corp said two additional MD-11F freighter aircraft were ordered by EVA Air to expand its fleet in 1997.
The Taiwan-based airline now operates three MD-11 passenger aircraft and three MD-11Fs, primarily on services across the Pacific to destinations in North America.
The new freighters are planned for delivery late this year. The airline disclosed its decision to acquire the new aircraft last month as part of an announcement of other fleet additions.
